author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HELENE CONTINUES TO SLOWLY SPIN DOWN TODAY INTO TOMORROW ACROSS THE TENNESSEE VALLEY.  WITH THE HEAVY RAIN LESSENING, THIS WILL BE THE LAST ADVISORY ON THE SYSTEM...
summary:
...HELENE CONTINUES TO SLOWLY SPIN DOWN TODAY INTO TOMORROW ACROSS THE TENNESSEE VALLEY.  WITH THE HEAVY RAIN LESSENING, THIS WILL BE THE LAST ADVISORY ON THE SYSTEM...
 As of 10:00 AM CDT Sat Sep 28
 the center of Helene was located near 36.6, -87.4
 with movement E at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 998 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 15 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Helene (AT4/AL092024)
